original_title: Dee Snider - Leave a Scar Album Release Show Streaming Concert
overview: To commemorate the release of his new album, DEE SNIDER has announced a streaming event for his fans on Thursday, July 29.  All ticket buyers will gain access to the concert stream on the 29th, as well as on-demand access to any and all content from the event for a 30-day period!  The concert stream features a very special concert from Snider performing live in New York back on June 12. Tickets for the stream are available now at www.metaldepartment.tv.
title: Dee Snider - Leave a Scar Album Release Show Streaming Concert
